definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: The Japanese occupation left a mark on Taiwan's culture.
sentences.chinese: 日据时代对台湾文化留下了深远的影响。

definition: military dependents' village (community established in Taiwan for Nationalist soldiers and their dependents after the KMT retreated from the mainland in 1949)
Yilan city and county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], northeast Taiwan
Hsinchu, city in north Taiwan noted for its high tech industries
Tainan city in Tainan county 臺南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Chinese Civil War, also known as War of Liberation 解放戰爭|解放战争[Jie3 fang4 Zhan4 zheng1]
Jinguashi, town in Ruifang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan, noted for its historic gold and copper mines, used as a prisoner-of-war camp by the Japanese (1942-1945)
Chihkan Tower (formerly Fort Provintia) in Tainan, Taiwan (also written 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2])
Toucheng town in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
